name: Mira Ashford
personality: Fearless, reckless, addicted to the thrill of the ruins.
description: Mira dives into the Boulder City ruins looking for salvage. She’s seen things she won’t talk about — and heard things she can’t explain.
questHooks: Claims she found a sealed bunker door under the rubble.
Heard a low hum echoing through the ruins at dawn.
Says someone is marking walls with strange symbols.
